section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on December 29, 2022.*
section.heading: Eligibility.

para.text: The Mayor may establish eligibility criteria to receive the services and supports contemplated by this chapter, including for statutory, regulatory, or programmatic categories of immigration, means of entering the District, and length of time in the United States or the District.
No provision of this chapter shall be construed to create an entitlement (either direct or implied) on the part of any individual or family to any services and supports provided under this chapter.

section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 4-773.02, see § 102 of Migrant Services and Supports Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-553, Sept. 30, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 102 of Migrant Services and Supports Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-553, Sept. 30, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
